4/5。
相比一代：
[list]
[*]调整了镜头，极大的减轻了眩晕感。
[*]传送门的判定更为智能，降低了操作的难度，毕竟是以解谜为主的游戏。
[*]增加了不少新元素，但对元素的利用不够充分。
[*]剧情更加丰富，与此同时画面表现也跟着变得复杂。但过多的剧情一定程度上影响了关卡的节奏，而复杂画面则是对解谜造成了很大的干扰。
[/list]

这个游戏我嗯那个说什么呢？挑不出什么毛病，颠覆脑洞级别的游戏，设计构思故事都是超级棒的。一口气通关，虽然有些关卡有难度，不过一点都不觉得累的游戏，故事情节优秀，多人合作需要考虑的东西更多，更有趣。随机配对和找基友一起玩都非常有乐趣。。虽然玩了很多次，但是隔一段时间就会想再来一遍，这就是经典的魅力吧！期待下一作！

Recuerdo cuando conoci por primera vez este juego, Nunca pense que talves un juego sin disparon ni sangre seria tan entretenido, recomendado si quieres darte un respiro de los juegos de shooter y quieres probar algo que hara que te detengas y razones que debes de hacer, muy buenos puzzles, ademas de contar con una comunidad map maker gracias a la cual nunca te quedaras sin mapas que jugar, y con el modo cooperativo pondras en practica el dicho "dos cabezas piensan mejor que una" muy recomendable.

Много слышал о игре, но сам не играл. А тут скидка. Всего за 79 рублей. Думаю - почему нет? Взял. В общем пока прошёл только сюжетку. Это заняло 7 часов. Тупил сильно, но прохождение не смотрел, хотел сам. По этому так долго, а так можно и быстрее пройти. В общем игра отличная, озвучка русская тоже порадовала. Учитывая, что я столько слышал о игре, я думал что будет что-то большее. А так отличная адвинчура с головоломками. Очень понравилась. Точно брать. Единственный недостаток по мне - "Если играть непрерывно, то очень надоедает проходить комнаты с тестами под конец".

Excelente. Esta é uma ótima palavra para descrever este jogo. Portal 2 é um jogo de puzzles difíceis e bem bolados, que te fazem querer entrar na história, sem contar as falas inesquecíveis de Cave Johnson, de Weathley e de Glados, sem duvidas uma das vilãs mais icônica dos jogos. Portal 2 é um jogo excelente e que ficará para sempre em minha memória.
OOOOO my GOOD!

Aight, so I'm reviewing Portal 2 now. This is gonna be fun.

If you wanna get your brain going and not miss out on this awesome sale, buy it. If you have an IQ less than mayonnaise: it's gonna be a bit tough.

Firstly, single player is great. It's humorous and challenging at the same time (at times), but it gets you going and reels you in to the story. Love it.

Second thing is: you need friends to enjoy this to the max. Co-op is an amazing feature they have implemented into the game. With that in mind, you need to beware those troll opportunities that could basically mean the difference between passing a short and easy level in 20 seconds, or in the time span between breakfast and dinner. Either way, it's an amazing experience, have fun while it lasts :D.

In short, here are your pros and cons:
Pros:
-Great story
-Great gameplay, no lag even on minimum specs
-Graphics are more than ok, they're good
-CO-OP is a great mode to play

Cons:
-Gets boring after a long, continuous time
-Need many snacks so you dont get bored

ALL in ALL, its a 10/10 for me. Must buy. :D

Великолепная игра!

Im reviewing only the single player campaign since its the main part of the game:

The story is really, i mean REALLY ingenious. knowing just a little bit of story from the first portal game makes this game even better.

While the first test chambers are easy to medium, the rest of the game isn't hard, but will sure make you search for the walkthrough on youtube.

The game can be finished legit in 3 hours, but most people do it in ~6 hours, if you dont hunt for easter eggs and references on how Apereture Science violated OSHA countless times.

In my opinion, this game is worth 100% buying, it has a great lore, even better soundtrack and very cool mechanics.
